1.content:
Pick the species your character is going to be.

Lilliputian: Small humans that inhabit Lilliput.

Anthro: Basically just the Argonians and Khajiit

Elf: The elves

Human: humans

Orcs: They are Orcs!
1.title: Species selection

11.content:
I would say Gender....but no, what is their technology? It really matters!

Medieval: Elder scrolls is in the Medieval ages, these people are medieval. The character is a "Giant" and the Lilliputians are small, and both might have magic. Very balanced!

Modern: Lets go world war III on the giant with our guns and machinery. Yes I said World War III

Steampunk: The home of metal and innovations. There is just going to be random creations like mechanical spiders and giant mechanical birds that shoot metal.

The classic age: People with Puffy wigs, British people, and crappy rifles that take 10 seconds to reload...
11.title: Lilliputian

112.content:
Of heart and mind. Of lead and wheels. can someone figure out how to get through the giants heavy metal armor? Its made of dragon bone for fucks sake!

Citizen: Only thing they are good for? Human shields and bait. Of course sometimes the citizens don't have to be useless all the time

Soldier: Amazingly I think the soldiers are going to last less than the citizen...

Political power: Someone of some power in the modern age. A president, mayor, or something else! Just lead these people.
112.title: Modern

1121.content: So are you a guy or a girl?
1121.title: Citizen

113.content:
What is your occupation?

Inventor: The sign of Steampunk, people with innovative imagination. I imagine if you try to attack us, you have to get through the giant robot

Elite guard: I would say soldier, but I assume if the giant is hostile the soldiers will be crushed. The elite guard on the other hand are a force to be reckoned with, no matter the size diffrence.

Monarch: The royalty of Steampunks. Either by blood or the most ingenious mind. Little bit of a fact: Blood Monarchs are more likely to be evil, the ingenious inventors are more likely to be good. The reason? Well don't ask, its story logic

Note: Peasants, villagers, or citizens aren't in here because...TECHNICALLY alot of the Citizens of Steampunk are always inventing something so the Inventors are the equivilent to citizens...in a way.
113.title: Steampunk

1132.content: Gender? And yes it actually does make a difference
1132.title: Elite Guard

11321.content:
Finneas Fault is a part of the elite guard, to be more precise, the "machine warrior" division which is basically a experianced soldier who is in some sort of giant steampunk machine such as a giant steampunk spider or scorpion. For future refrences other elite guard divisions include ones with weapon prosthetics, others with steampunk attachments that give different abilities, and those who just carry special and unique weapons. Now let's begin...

For several weeks now there has been a major conflict going around in the land of lilliput. There has been a discovery of giant beings who some are hostile, others are friendly, and a few are plain neutral. This has everyone on edge, who knows if one of these giants found them and they were hostile, what then? Would their military be able to stand up against them or will they all get annihilated or become slaves? Well to Finneas and the rest of the elite guard, they are prepared for the worst of it and are ready to stand by and will not give up even if the odds of them surviving or slim to none.

Well, today that decision is made. At the training grounds, Finneas was in his steampunk spider squaring off against a friend of his, Damien, who was wearing arm and leg prosthetics (Metallic of course) with a semi-large group watching them taking bets.
"Alright Damien, are you ready?" Finneas questioned and Damien's prosthetics changed to be more weapon like, with his legs becoming blades, his right arm becoming a gun of sorts and left becoming cannon shaped.
"Ready!" Damien replied confidently
"Okay then, engarde!" Then the spider started to move to attack when a large blaring sound rang throughout the kingdom "Oh for the love of!"
"Well, let's finish this later" Then everyone scattered, getting their weapons, getting into their steampunk machines, and getting ready to probably die a horrible, horrible death. Then Damien climbed onto Finneas's spider,
"What are you doing?" Finneas questioned
"I need a ride and you probably need an extra gunner on you"
"Get off, you'll get in my way"
"I'm not asking and you damn well know I'm not moving"
"Agh! Whatever!"

When Finneas finally got into position outside of the city walls, it seems that the giant is...
11321.title: Interrupted match

12.content: Which the only two anthro's in the entire Elder Scrolls series are Argonians and Khajiit...as far as I know
12.title: Anthro

1211.content:
Occupation? I swear if you come up on shore it is going to be a godzilla moment, classic!

Thief: Giant lizard-thing that is pickpocketing the lilliputians without them realizing it even though she is like 50 feet tall and hovering right above them - Lilliput logic

Sailor: Why a sailor? Because Argonians can breathe underwater and this is basically the part where you come up like godzilla and terrorize the people. You don't have to but it seems right

Mercenary: Not only ruthless and cold-hearted, but also a female. Plus Argonians have Histskin : Invoke the power of the Hist to recover health ten times faster for 60 seconds. Yeah it doesn't matter if you have good weapons it seems...
1211.title: Female

12112.content:
Your name is Veeziri Arlgate, an Argonian with dark-green colored scales, by standards you are taller than most people and basically the tallest on the ship. The type of clothing/armor you are wearing is leather, which the only part not covered is the head, and your weapon is a steel blade at your side and a steel dagger on your leg. The ship you are on is called the Tempest and the Captain is a middle-aged Nord named Avaertus, whose leadership actually kept them alive from all the places you have been. Now enough with the introductions, lets get to the story.

At a port in some low-down village that you never bothered to check what the name is, you were in the Tavern where you were talking to fellow sailors about some of the adventures some of them had. Which the one that was talking was Aloin, a young Redguard who is very Naive for his own good
"And so this slaver just held me in this jailcell for about several moons before you people finally come to rescue me" Aloin was saying when Abram interrupted him, Abram was a male Orc mercenary we had for a while, he was good at he what he does, but he can be a bit harsh
"We didn't come to rescue you, it just so happened that slaver had a giant bounty on him and you were extra" Then someone else jumped right in, it was Arival, a female Khajiit that does the most ridiculous thieving schemes that you have ever seen and somehow they worked
"Sometimes Abram, you can at least be a little bit nicer!"
"Nice does not exist in me" Then to just get out before someone starts a brawl you say something
"Let's just see if the ship is ready to launch to sea" All of them agreed and we went out onto the morning sun, where there wasn't much people out, just some kids running around and some others talking about things.

You all arrived at the port where there were still sailors loading in some cargo, though not that much you wished they would hurry things up. While the 3 you were with helped move some of the cargo, you went to the captains quarters to see if he was there. He was there and he was talking to a young-looking male, nord.
"Captain, all I'm saying is that this place is all, but myths and fairytales!" The young-nord said
"That's what they said about the dragons and now look at the skies!" Avaertus responded "And unless I'm on Skooma, they are as real as they can be!"
"That is a diffrent matter, this place cannot possibly exist" The nord said "Even if it did, you'd think someone would have found it by now!"
"That is because they are not good enough, now good day to you!" The nord went out of the quarters and you went in to see the Captain looking at a map
"yes, what do you want Veeziri?" Avaertus questioned
"Captain, what was that man talking about?" You questioned
"Ah, it's about this myth about this landmass named Liliput and it is said that they are smaller versions of us humans"
"I have never heard of that myth"
"That's because many laughed at the possibility" Laertus stated "Like they did with dragons, but now they are alive and breathing fire. If giants can exist so why can't small people?"
"Why do you want to see a Lilliputian?"
"I am interested at what they are, that is all" He responded "Now, put this ship into gear, we are headed out onto Lilliput"
"And if you are wrong?"
"Well then I have to fight off a mutiny of 20 men"

After leaving for the open sea's, to look for a land that is in myth and fairytale. We have enough supplies to last us several months and only have the patience for only a couple. You think that this is just a fool's errand and a blinded quest to find a place that is yet to be discovered. Several weeks go by and some of the men grew weary of what the destination is since the Captain never mentioned it in front of the crew as such they would have deemed him a crazy and would have either left or change his mind. But then something happened...
12112.title: On the open waters

121121.content:
You and the rest of the crew were screwing around, trying to pass the time when suddenly the world was sent in amassive storm. The entire deck was pounded by rain, visibility was completely impaired, and the waves rocked the boat almost to the point it will capsize. The entire crew was on deck trying to keep the ship afloat by making sure the masts and sails didn't break apart, but as you can see the storm is making it hard to maneuver correctly as some men went overboard. The entire time this happened the captain was at the helm trying to steer the Tempest out of danger, but alas this may be futile as multiple large figures were spotted up ahead, they were jagged rocks and the ship was heading straight for it no matter how hard the captain or crew tried to steer off course.
"Hold men! HOLD!" The captain yelled over the roar of the storm itself, but that didn't help in the slightest as the ship made contact with the jagged rocks, making the ship sink quickly.

This was the que for the men to abandon ship, but due to the jagged rocks there may have been some people who may have died upon landing in the water. You were one of the last to go as you saw the captain standing tall at the helm looking up at the sky
"A captain goes down with his ship! Take your best shot mistress of the ocean, I have survive worser situations than this!" Than out of all the odds, lighting from the clouds struck down on Captain Avaertus which he was still standing proud "Is that all you got?!" You realize that the captain is not going to be moved from that spot even if an army tried to move him. You then dived into the water to see that navigating in the violent waves and currents weren't going to be an easy task.

While trying to stay alive in the violent storm, you saw that the ship had completely submerged underwater and that there were bodies being whipped around the waves like rag dolls, whoever was still alive were either extremly lucky or very good swimmers. Unfortunately when the ship submerged all the supplies that were inside began to pile out quickly and they became another hazard to avoid, which you were knocked unconscious when a barrel hit you behind the head.

Its a good thing you are Argonian, otherwise you would have drowned or have gotten hypothermia after floating in the ocean for quite a bit of time. Your still unconscious body floated with the current in which it made it onto the shore where the lilliputians have yet to see you. What exact time period are these tiny people in? It really matters on account of weapons they would use and their reaction.
121121.title: A storm of dread

choices: The creature is enraged and hostile!
1211211.content:
You were a novice adventurer that just started his journey in the land of Lilliput. Near the shore you were tending to a wound on your arm which was by a bandit group that ambushed you on the dirt trail, which they stole your horse, most of your gear, and all you had were the clothes on your back and a old damaged iron dagger. You stared out at sea to look at its beauty in the sunlight, but that was when you notice something floating on the surface, something very, very large. When it got started to float closer to the shore you could see the figure more clearly and describe its features. It was a gigantic reptilian creature in some sort of leather armor with the largest blades you ever seen, it might be female from its figure and you thank the lord that it was unconscious.

Out of fear of what would happen if the creature had awoken from its slumber, you ran back to the village as fast as you can to alert the kings guardsmen and anyone who were able-bodied to wield a blade or bow. When you made it to the village to alert the guards, they didn't believe in the story you told them, they thought you had either been drinking too much or that you were insane out of your mind. After a long argument, several guards on horseback came up to see if your claim was correct, if not then your head was in a basket.

Riding back to the shore didn't take much time, when the guards saw the giant reptilian creature they were dumbfounded about the possibility of such a creature existing and one of massive proportions with giant blades. They hurried back to the kingdom to get everyone in arms to try to restrain the creature and to prepare for an attack if the creature is hostile. They weren't taking any chances as they had their best soldiers and mage's with many siege weapons for security measures (Siege weapons such as ballista's and catapults)

The basic scenario excecution in this was that they basically got heavy chains and ropes, many horses and men, and the mages to help in the moving of the creature. This plan was going swimmingly until the creature started to awake from its slumber. You thought to yourself,
"Oh we are all going to die" Oh and the restraints were already on. Also the size of the creature was very big, to be more exact her size estimate is about 130ft.
1211211.title: Of knights and men

12112112.content:
When the creature began to wake there were several soldiers on her and very close to her that were very started by the sudden movements and then they did one of the stupidest and idiotic actions that would most likely kill them, attack the creature that is many times their size and would easily eat or crush them with the chance their weapons would do nothing from ticking her to actually breaking on contact.

That was when the creature had sat up, easily making the restraints snap and the soldiers that were on her bosom fall and land on either her abdomen or other soldiers on the ground. She shook her head and looked around to see the small men attacking her out of fear. Though she seemed to understand why they attacked her, it was still rather rude they would do that and very foolish and so came this "You dare attack me?!" She said and everyone stopepd attacking "If that is all you have to offer as an attack, then it is futile. It is also rude of you to attack someone if you don't know if they're hostile or not. Fear or not, it will have consequences" She then stood up to her full height which was very intimidating and soldier that were on her just fell to the ground and scrambled up to face what was next.

The creature then lifted up her foot and slammed it down onto the closest soldiers, making sand and blood spray in all directions.
"Attack!" All the men went into arms and attacked with blade and arrow, some fled and others stayed. As for you, you didn't want to be a part of this madness of taking on a creature that would easily demolish this band of knights. So you went onto horseback and fled to the castle in hope that the siege weaponry and large number of soldiers would be able to take her out.

If all else fails, then there is either the chance of domination or annihilation.
12112112.title: Thou art be running quickly

choices: While sailing she was tricked and kicked out overboard
12113.content:
Somewhere in Riffton; inside is a small bar, home of the private VIP chosen to enter; various of different mix of race of Nords and Elves. However there is one Argonian who sits her private room talking with a client who offer her a job. This Argonian is name Erica, a young black Argonian Sorceress with two pair of pointed white horns; she listen to her client while making his drink offering the Nord for some Rum. Erica was actually a name given by her former Mage master and even raised her like his own child.

While throughout her childhood; she was interested in magic and always wanted to be the best Sorceress in all Skyrim, she asked her step father to teach her the ways of magic; and so he accepted to be her teacher.

Overtime she master everything and even bit of hand to hand combat even the ways of swords too; then just until she was complete it her training. Her master fallen eel and died just in his forties; she traveled along the north until she found group of Mercenaries somewhere around the Coves. She joined with them and helped out a bounty to kill an band of Bandits who were cussing trouble with the guards in Riffton.

Fast forward they paid her let her go on her way

"So a mysterious island and what me to find an ancient sowrd?" She asked her Clint with very little bit of interest and didn't bye it about mystery island.

"Yes apparently it can shred a Giant with one swing and some say it's made by the gods of Oblivion." However he was telling her a lie; but not telling her that there's catch to this story. "Out there; you need a boat and a crew and lucky you." He pointed to himself with enthusiasm in his voice "I'm a captain of a ship of fifth-teen Crew members."

She accept the offer of One Billion of Gold plus endless supply's Soul Gems which she wanted more for her work back home.

The two traveled to the port of Skyrim and hoped on the Queens Eye; this ship is size of a warship.

And so her adventures began.
12113.title: Mercenary

choices: Discovered by group of small fisher men
121131.content:
She wasn't sure of how long that herself was on this ship, which felt to her like weeks. Around her various of Nords, Orcs and oddly there's a lot of Elves roaming around this ship. She recognized the Elves outfit back when she was a slave; the Thalmore mages were watching her; however she didn't want to believe this is a trap and not someone ratel her out.

One of the Nords sailor who was interested of the Black Argonian and was curious why she's on board. However one of the other sailor stopped him from talking to the Argonian. "You fool the boss want us to stay away from her."

He acknowledged his comrade and just carry on with his dutys on the ship.

She heard there conversations from afar; her gut was right about this job seemed fishy in some way. She headed of to the Captains courters and try to ask him of what's with this ship; though this was indeed a trap and that she knew that from the start.

"Captain are you in?" She knocked the door several times; but for few seconds the captain didn't answer nore any sound in the room; until her sole feet felt blood underneath her. "This is better be someone spilled and not someone's blood." She sigh on the blood on the floor and prepared what's in store for her; she kicked the door down, pulls out her knife from her loincloth.

"The hell.....ack!" Something hitting her head and blacked out; lay down on the wooden floor.

"For a Argonian; she is quite sexy but sadly, the mistress wanted her gone." The ghost revealed it self as a Nord with black leather armor; his partner comes out of hiding from the closet. "You know throwing her of will be sad though she find land anyway." His friend removed Erica's belt which had her books, potions, her throwing knives and removes her jewelry living her unarmed. Soon they throw her out and just laughing out loud on their mission complete it.

She woke up alone on a rock but oddly to herself "where am I?!" She noticed an island far up to the east; it was land however it isn't Skyrim but it didn't matter too her she needed to find the way back to Skyrim.
121131.title: While sailing she was tricked and kicked out ov...

1211311.content:
She swim far for good mile and luckily for her kind she can breath under water but her tiredness isn't her kind favorite. She managed to get to shore but suffer with her clothing are gone revealing naked to her body, matters worst she is unarmed and her mana depleted; now very weak, she tried to walk but once again fell to the sandy beaches. She decided now to just relax and sleep; she suddenly forget everything else and just glad herself still alive. She lay on her back closing her eyes and while leaving one knee up; however she wasn't realized that she was alone.

Two small creatures who were watching the giant lizard sleeping on their beach; the two panic and headed towards their city to alert there king of a giant monster laying on there Territory.

The king was later enform about the monster on there beach and like the two scouts that seen it was too startle; he get hold him self and just order his men to find anyone to help contain the giant.

Almost every male citizen all marching towards the sleeping giant with ladder, ropes, chains and other weapons that may hurt her, plus they also brought their mages to come help learning about the giant too study it.

Then that came's your Lilliputien character?
1211311.title: Swim to shore

121131112.content:
Your Name is Benjamin Faldwin and your a recruit in the lilliputien army; your best weapon of specialty is a sowrd and a bow. You join the army for volunteer; you choose this ever since you father passing and you wanted to honor him with pride, following his foot steps.

One day, one of your colleagues discovered a monster on the shore of Lilliput. At first your were excited to get some action and prepared him self for his next chapter in life; but finds out that the giant is really huge almost nearly 70ft and compare to it his kind is only near the size of the giant's pinky toe.

"My god? Giant lizard; could this be dragon?" You watch your colleagues all around calling this monster a dragon, oddly it looked similar; but it's shaped is humanoid in nature. "This monster has breast of a woman, judgeing it's huge then my wife!" He couldn't help and think about of what that soldier said. "Let's began quick; we need this monster contain quick!"

All ropes flying all over the down Giantess Argonian from head, toe and tail; the soldiers of Lilliputiens all worked hard in full force trying their best against time; however the only problem for them is how they can lift the Giant to the cart? The head Mage; Faltonmore had planned an idea by using an red aliment gem to lift her body towards the cart.

Benjamin's first task was to help secured the right leg however to him who? "Who can I do this?!" Your were unsure about this job and feared he would ether fall or crushed by the giant. His Sargent tell him to climb up the black obsidian scale leg; he gupled at by looking at the towering leg. "Alright son we want you to use this hammer; and hit at knee, but gently or else you lunch up in the air!" Once again it didn't helped him and fear began to grow more.

Mewhile: few several mages set up a little site at the Giants opening between it's legs. There mission was to examine of what gender it is even the rest believe it's female judging by the huge humps on the chest. Two the mage go in and while the remaining outside trying to plant pillars between the opening using it as a harness. For several minutes they finish exploring inside the opening and gain few samples too; they order the rest of the group that they confirmed the Giant is female. "While inside we noticed almost exactly close similar parts like a human though; I can't understand, to explain." They both say in unison.

You complete it your task after you hold to your deadly life from bosses ordered; you rest on the knee and watched everyone starting to focus tying the leg.

Several hours later they completed pining the giantess to the ground however they noticed a slight hint of movement. Very close of waking up.
121131112.title: Soldier

1211311121.content:
Oddly to herself, she felt more heavy then usual but she knew something is wrong though; she felt slight pain on her face infact it almost felt like tiny hooks. Her tail was pinned too or to make matters worst even her fingers and toes felt tighter too move; but then what's crawling on her body? She tried to open her eyes, trying to seek what's happening to her; the problem since she got hit in the head and felt tired from all the swimming and now felt uncomfortable.

"The giant is awake!" She open her crimson eyes again and this time she able to see around her she heard constantly of small voice saying giant dragon is awake. "Who's there?!" Her voice bit stress and fear of what's happening or who's talking to her. She slightly looked around however the unknown restraint kept her down; suddenly she see why. She noticed almost thousands of tiny ropes all around her body, then she saw the source of the sound a group small Nords, tiny Nords. "What's stabbed into my face?!"

They hooked her face with tiny hooks to help to force her down.
1211311121.title: Erica's point of few

choices: They took her to lilliput on cart
12113111211.content:
She felt vulnerable in her situation and being held prisoner by tiny Nord race. What matters worst, they were also experimenting on her body like a test rat. Then out of the blue robe looking figure standing on her left boob. "Who are you dragon?" The man told her question; but she couldn't believe they are speaking in the same language as her. "....Erica I'm a sorceress from Skyrim."

The man didn't know anything about Skyrim and was curious if the monster was telling the truth. "How am I know your telling the truth dragon?" Once again she heard they keep calling her dragon though she would ament; her kind is slightly a bit related but she isn't a dragon even though she might have on some appearance like dragon. "I'm not dragon, I'm an Argonian."

"Argonian....never heard of them, but it doesn't matter; your a monster and that's it and your now are prisoner giantess."
12113111211.title: She couldn't break free

1212.content:
Occupation? Incoming gigantic lizard monster in leather armor, giant one-handed sword, and wooden shield...okay I didn't see that coming!

Thief: I don't think a giant lizard pickpocketing people in the street is suspicious....

Sailor: Again...Godzilla moment from the water!

Healer: Why healer? Because apparently when you start out as an Argonian you have +25 to restoration. well at least people will like you!
1212.title: Male

1221.content:
What is your cat person's occupation?

Thief: I know Khajiit are sneaky and cats but...if they manage to sneak past lilliputians and they are giants I don't even know!

Trader: Hey, maybe when you get back home you can sell the tiny people for a price or use them for something else. Or just use your speechcraft and everything will be fine

Hunter: Giant cat person with giant bow and arrow that counts as a ballista...we need more people or we can use this guy to hunt a dragon
1221.title: male

1222.content:
What is your cat person's occupation?

Thief: I know Khajiit are sneaky and cats but...if they manage to sneak past lilliputians and they are giants I don't even know!

Alchemist: Not really sure what to do with this person. Make a potion out of trees and make something that makes the skin as hard as wood or make something that will make the people stoned. Might as well make lighting in a bottle and see if the people will think your god...

Hunter: Giant crossbow ballista, we are doomed.
1222.title: female

choices: The lilliputiens began tying up Flora
Flora woke up and surrounded off tiny humans with odd weapons.
12223.content:
A Khajiit name Flora who was busy out hunting around in the deepest forest somewhere around near the Storm Clooks camps. Flora people warn her about the Storm Clooks where out patrolling near the cove and her one few almost near there turff. Flora who doesn't care and got her arrows and staff in case she ever encountered with any humans who dare to attack her. She went off with out her people support, however today for Flora she will about to discover a new world....just under her feet.

Flora who suddenly fallen to a unknown houl which seem like it was magically camouflage, she tried to grab on something to hold but soon later she fell on very soft floor. She noticed the floor is grass but oddly seemed small? She noticed lot off tiny items on the ground which looked like children toys.

While exploring through the caves for long time, Flora eventually found a odd shrine of sorts but seemed beyond agent, oddly she noticed lot off cages with various of size. Out of the corner a little tiny human which looked seemed to be wearing an armor of sorts watching the giant cat exploring the shrine.

"Be sure began the next phase." The armored soldier ordered his other men to start the trap to lore the Khajiit to the designated spot. "She's at the spot start it."

Flora heard odd of different souring sounds all around, she looked around while holding her staff to be prepared for anything however it's to late. She noticed the floor on the ground started to change different colors "what by oblivion is this?!" She noticed she was falling through the color floor, she tried to scream for help but the floor keeps pulling her down through unknown trap.

"Sir we got her, our transport we'll guide us towards the falling giantess back home." A voice coming from the armored soldiers helmets. Those tiny creatures seemed advanced in nature almost alien.

So Flora journey in unknown world called Lilliput well changed her life forever.
12223.title: Hunter

13.content: The elves, known for their magic ability and thier role in Lord of the rings!
13.title: Elves

1311.content:
Occupation please?

Mage: I have the power! *Summons giant lighting bolt from the heavens*

Mist-walker: Basically involves magical shields and other things...Well time to screw around with the populace with illusions!

Magi-Thief: A thief with magic, great not only do I get shanked and robbed, but I get frozen solid...at least its weaker than normal
1311.title: Male

1312.content:
I see you have a hand at magic...well someone is going to think you are a god!

Mage: This being seems to shoot fire out of her hands, I am not screwing with her lets just retreat!

Magi-thief: The diffrence between this and regular thieves? This one can still use magic, just not as effectively as the mage, but still magic. Plus I'll be damned if this was a real class

Alchemist: Well good thing I know how to store my magic in these bottles! *Bottle of lighting, fire, acid, and ice* We are so hosed
1312.title: Female

1321.content:
Let me see at your magic level and...holy crap! Dragonborn, what does your scouter say about- *FUS RO DAH!*
Dragonborn: What were you saying?
Random person: Uh, nevermind
Dragonborn: Can I say something in your ear?
Random person: Nope!

*Skit ends*

Mage: Its bad the magic power is so high

Mistwalker: Magical shields and weapons...just dandy!

Healer: Would you perfer magic or alchemy?
1321.title: Male

1322.content:
I can see that your skill in magic is...holy crap that is some good magic!

Mage: With all of the magical abilities, the amount of power generated is going to be a bastard!

Healer: The one thing people love more than a giant is a giant that can heal you, so don't complain about her prescence.

Conjurer: Proving more help against armies or making an army against the Lilliputians, who knows, but the Conjurer and her ability to spam summon this weak monster!
1322.title: Female

133.content: Gender? Sometimes this is tedious...
133.title: Wood elf

1331.content:
Wood elves in the forest? That is unheard of!

Hunter: You know I used to shoot guards in the knee back home, but now when I shoot arrows they either explode or their entire leg is gone...

Thief: Several times I would rob people on the road. I would leave a clean kill and leave with loot. But now there are giant crevices and holes in the ground and there is a bloody mess.

Alchemy: I used to do my work in peace in a cabin, but then a potions exploded and blew up my entire cabin...SON OF A-
1331.title: Male

1332.content:
The occupation is always in the forest.

Hunter: Seems very appropriate, but I don't think you have much hiding places...just a hunch

Thief: Back home, thieves used to rob innocents on the roads in the forest. But this time its going to take more than that

Alchemist: Making potions out of plants...now making potions out of trees and prisoners!
1332.title: Female

14.content: The human types (Or races if you perfer)
14.title: Human

141.content: Gender for the people that have dragons?
141.title: Nord

1411.content:
The job of a nord is to protect Skyrim!

Knight: With a shining long blade that strikes fear in all men, armor that is think and impenatrable, there is not a force than can stand against me!

Warrior: I bring morale to the troops. My roar brings fear into my foes. Wait whats the diffrence between me and a Knight?...okay then call me a beserker than you dingus!

Blacksmith: I just make the weapons for soldiers and bandits alike. As long as they don't attack or steal from me I'm just fine.
1411.title: Male

1412.content:
In the name of Skyrim, in tamriel, I will cut you down to size! *Looks at Lilliputians* Okay looks like someone already did that

Merchant: Maybe if you're lucky these people won't attack you, maybe you can go to a truce or something...

Knight: You call me a dinky, weak, and frail woman!? *Carries heavy shield, swords, and armor* Never mess with people like that...

Foot-soldier: Basically just a soldier with light armor and regular weapons. nothing special, but versatile! Though I think you are now what they call cannon fodder
1412.title: Female

142.content: Gender? Something tells me there was some racial things about the Redguard...I can't seem to put my finger on it *Insert picture of redguard in their desert uniform and indonesian blades* Nothing seems to come up in my mind...
142.title: Red Guard

1421.content:
The Redguard. Why they are called that no one will never know!

Ranger: With bow and arrow in hand, I will shoot you in the Knee! (I'm not sure of the diffrence of hunter and ranger...lets just make them the same to avoid confusion)

Foot-soldier: A soldier in leather armor and a indonesian blade...just give me some actual armor dammit!

Blacksmithing: You want to know the secret in how I make glass armor? Well too bad, but here is a hint...I live in a goddamn desert!
1421.title: Male

1422.content:
I didn't think they were that red unless they are mad!

Mage: More accustomed to destruction magic...but I'll take it!

Foot-soldier: Why are we always cannon fodder?

Ranger: Bows and arrows make break my bones, but- *Gets shot in the leg* You suck ranger, you just suck
1422.title: Female

143.content: Gender?....What kind of race is named Breton? It sounds like someones name
143.title: Breton

1431.content:
Breton: Useful against magical douchebags

Merchant: I have talked myself out of tight situations, but this is a first and my fighting ability sucks!

Alchemist: Lets see here...Growth potion, shrinking potion, Dragon potion? Hm...I wonder...

Mist-walker: Making weapons out of my hands! eat my magical power!
1431.title: Male

1432.content:
Sometimes I think Bretons are used as Magical sponges

Conjurer: Here comes an army. Would you summon a bigger army? And that is literal actually, since you have Atronachs that are bigger than you...

Healer: I'm guessing you can pull this arrow out of my eye

Mist-walker: The giant mystical hammer of doom
1432.title: Female

144.content: Gender? Something tells me these people are Imperialists...just a hunch
144.title: Imperial

1441.content:
You know, this seems appropriate somehow.

Knight: I'm a big guy with a giant sword and shield. I dare you to attack me

Mage: Honestly all I can do is destruction magic so...eat my flame!

Enchanter: I may not know how to make a weapon, but I can make your weapons less crappy!
1441.title: Male

1442.content:
Imperialists seem to be some lucky bastards

Knight: Heavy armor, a shield, and a sword. I'm perfectly fine

Healer: A fan favourite if they are pulling out arrows out of thier guards!

Enchanter: If I help improve your weapons, will you not attack me? I am too tired to fight you.
1442.title: Female

15.content: Pick your gender. Though it makes me wonder why there aren't any Dwarves or Hobbits in the elder scrolls...too much fantasy even though there are lizard and cat people...
15.title: Orc

151.content:
Your profession, occupation, or whatever the word is for class, job, or whatever.

Knight: A big green orc in giant metal armor. That is so not intimidating. Who knows what will happen.

Beserker: Most likely to be angered if you attack or strap him down with ropes...prepare to get smashed! -Destroying

Blacksmith: Most likely kinder than the other two. This will go in two ways, the Orc will help the Lilliputians SOMEHOW or he does nothing...until they provoke him
151.title: Male

152.content:
What is your profession, class, job, etc?

Beserker: You can bet that if you attack this female orc, alot of heads will be rolling...down her throat. Easily aggravated

Mercenary: Ruthless, cold-hearted, and female. Oh good lord this is not going to end well!

Blacksmith: Still nicer than the other two. Might be helpful, neutral, or etc.
152.title: Female

info.brief_description: Taking it to the land of small people
info.description:
This is Lilliput. The land of tiny people where apparently people all over shipwrecks and gets captured on this piece of land. You either play as a Elder scrolls species or an inhabitant of Lilliput. Here is something to know: This is not an ordinary Lilliput story where someone shipwrecks and takes over the tiny inhabitants, this time you can do something other than that.

Rules:
1. Erotic things are allowed, just don't do it every chapter. I did this because I know someone is going to add a erotic thing in a story in Lilliput.
2. Do not make the *giant* main character indestructable or immortal, that seem's to be a giant trend in many stories...unless you have a plausable reason like some heavy thick armor or some magic shielding
3. You can do something other than erotic things. Such as taking over the Lilliputians, helping them in a war, explore the land or something other than stuffing tiny people down your pants...
4. Be descriptive and do not have extremely short chapters, its a waste of space. Unless its something like a transition or choice or something
*Edit* 5. I forgot to mention that it is a limit of 1 character for the giant characters, that being because there is about 60 diffrent characters you can make out of them. As for the Lilliputians, they can have as much as they want.
